title: Japanese server
body: How to check ping for Japan server?

replies.body:
Hey AKMU,

The best way to do this would be to create an account on the server you want to play on and play a few Custom Games to see what your ping is. Since there are a lot of factors that has to be accounted for when it comes to your connection to the server, this would be the best way to gauge your ping to any server you desire to play on or transfer to. (context regarding factors that can affect one's connection can be found in the Engineering blog: https://engineering.riotgames.com/news/fixing-internet-real-time-applications-part-i)

press CTRL F in mid game..
But i thought japanese servers arent live yet?
